original_text: And on the tops of the pillars was lily-work. Thus the work of the pillars was finished.
korean_text: 그 두 기둥 꼭대기에는 백합화 형상이 있더라 두 기둥의 공사가 끝나니라

sentences.original_text: on the tops of the pillars was lily-work.
sentences.korean_translation: 기둥 꼭대기에는 백합 모양의 장식이 있었습니다.

sentences.original_text: the work of the pillars was finished.
